Package SLogo.View

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CanvasView
    Created by th174 on 2/19/2017.
    CommandLineView
    Interface for the CommandLine.
    SLogoGUI
    Created by th174 on 2/16/2017.
    SLogoGUIElement
    For ause with objects that contain nodes
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CanvasPropertiesDisplay
    This class creates a popup for the user to change the Turtle Environment's properties
    CanvasViewImpl
    This class implements CanvasView to handle all View properties and Turtle properties for SLogo
    CommandLineViewBasic
    Commandline takes in commands and passes it to the Repl
    Project
    Main project that contains all of the items necessary for running SLogo code
    SLogoGUIImpl
    Implementation of the main slogo gui
    TurtleMath
    This class handles all math associated with the turtle moving in its environment.
    XMLParser
    This class parses an XML file to populate the default values for CanvasView
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    ErrorPrompt
